title: Schöner als Akazienholz
notes: 2011 Pablo Giorgelli Argentine minimalist road movie - Caméra d'Or winner at Cannes, distinctive slow cinema style

title: Schusslinie (In der )
notes: 1993 Wolfgang Petersen thriller with Clint Eastwood as Secret Service agent vs John Malkovich assassin - distinctive cat-and-mouse premise

title: Schwarze Dahlie (Die)
notes: 2006 Brian De Palma neo-noir based on James Ellroy novel with Josh Hartnett, Scarlett Johansson - infamous 1947 LA murder case

title: Secretary – Womit kann ich dienen
notes: 2002 Steven Shainberg unconventional romance with Maggie Gyllenhaal, James Spader about BDSM relationship - distinctive character study

title: Sehnsüchtig – Wicker Park
notes: 2004 Paul McGuigan remake of French L'Appartement with Josh Hartnett, Rose Byrne - distinctive mystery romance structure
